name: Ralph H. Johnson VA Medical Center Reviews

review.title: “wonderful personnel relations...low pay”
review.pros: Pros – Benefits include job stability (gov) and at this vamc many opportunities for individual career exploration and growth. Strong communication network.
review.cons: Cons – cons also are representative of government work; specifically identified and limited roles, low expectations, and little incentive to achieve.
review.advice-to-management: Yes, I would recommend this company to a friend
